search_2060_m23_1/6201_1201_0100_10:
Ack! What’s with those Trainers and their
weird masks?!
search_2060_m23_1/6201_1201_0300_10:
We’re outnumbered. Even if we fight ’em
head on...
search_2060_m23_1/6201_1201_0400_10:
What do you want? You’re interfering with our
work here. Go away!
search_2060_m23_1/6201_1201_0500_10:
Wait a sec. I recognize that twerp...
You’re [Name:PlayerNickname ], ain’t ya?
search_2060_m23_1/6201_1201_0800_10:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ]’s one of the up-and-comin’ young Trainers
from the PML. If we get [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="’im" F="’er" ] to work with us...
search_2060_m23_1/6201_1201_1000_10:
We really want to save the Mythical
Pokémon Celebi!
search_2060_m23_1/6201_1201_1100_10:
If Team Break catches it, I’m sure something bad
will happen to it!
search_2060_m23_1/6201_1201_1200_10: Please help us! We need your skills!
search_2060_m23_1/6202_1201_0100_10:
All those masked Trainers are blocking the way.
We can’t get through...
search_2060_m23_1/6202_1201_0200_10:
James, you didn’t happen to bring one of your
special robots, did you?
search_2060_m23_1/6202_1201_0300_10:
Not today, I’m afraid. We’re trying to cut down on
costs until we get to the jungle, remember?
search_2060_m23_1/6202_0401_0500_10:
Some jungle we heard about near a
different town!
search_2060_m23_1/6202_0402_0700_10:
Yes! Our original plan was to catch Pokémon in
that jungle!
search_2060_m23_1/6202_1201_0800_10:
We heard there were packs of rare Pokémon
living there!
search_2060_m23_1/6202_1201_0900_10: Don’t give away our plan, you nitwit!
search_2060_m23_1/6202_1201_1000_10:
I don’t care what ya do! Just do somethin’ about
this already!
search_2060_m23_1/6202_1201_1100_10:
In that case, we’ll have to fall back on a tried-
and-true classic that costs us nothing!
search_2060_m23_1/6202_1201_1300_10:
The ground around here seems pretty firm, though.
We need to find a spot where it’s easier to dig!
search_2060_m23_1/6203_1201_0300_10:
We’re outnumbered. C’mon, let’s get outta here
for now.
search_2060_m23_1/6203_1201_0500_10:
We’ll fight with you! We gotta pay you back for
helping us!
search_2060_m23_1/6203_1201_0600_10:
Yeah! And I can’t forgive anyone who would
bully Pokémon!
search_2060_m23_1/6203_1201_1100_10: To protect the world from devastation!
search_2060_m23_1/6203_1201_1200_10: To unite all peoples within our nation!
search_2060_m23_1/6203_1201_1300_10: To denounce the evils of truth and love!
search_2060_m23_1/6203_1201_1400_10: To extend our reach to the stars above!
search_2060_m23_1/6203_1201_1900_10: Team Rocket, blast off at the speed of light!
search_2060_m23_1/6203_1201_2000_10: Surrender now, or prepare to fight!
search_2060_m23_1/6203_1201_2200_10: Have we ever been this well received?
search_2060_m23_1/6203_1201_2300_10: Never! I sure am glad we came to Pasio!
search_2060_m23_1/6203_1201_2500_10: We’ll show you what real evildoers are like!
search_2060_m23_1/6204_1201_0200_10:
Hah! Not an ounce of originality in their parting
shot, either.
search_2060_m23_1/6204_1201_0300_10: Now we can take our time catching Celebi—
search_2060_m23_1/6204_1201_0400_10: Looks like Celebi managed to get away!
search_2060_m23_1/6204_1201_0500_10: I’m glad those bad guys didn’t catch it!
search_2060_m23_1/6204_1201_0700_10: You’ve got to be KIDDING me!
search_2060_m23_1/6204_1201_0800_10:
Well, Celebi got away. Should we start heading
to that jungle now?
search_2060_m23_1/6204_1201_0900_10:
After coming all this way and having nothing to
show for it? Never! I’ve got my pride, you know!
search_2060_m23_1/6204_1201_1000_10:
I’ll just pretend to join that twerp’s team and wait
until [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] lets [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] guard down...
search_2060_m23_1/6204_1201_1100_10:
then you two can sneakily steal [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] team’s
partner Pokémon!
search_2060_m23_1/6204_1201_1200_10:
If we can get our hands on some strong Pokémon
and bring ’em to the boss...
search_2060_m23_1/6204_1201_1300_10: ...We’ll climb the ranks in no time flat!
search_2060_m23_1/6204_1201_1400_10:
Wow, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You sure are strong. I’m impressed!
search_2060_m23_1/6204_1201_1500_10:
Y’know what I’d just love? If you, like, let me join
your team or whatever.
search_2060_m23_1/6204_0402_1900_10:
You don’t want me?! I don’t care if you turn me
down! I’ll tag along anyway!
